thread.title: Kanche's new trailer stuns audiences
thread.title_full: Kanche's new trailer stuns audiences - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Kanche's new trailer stuns audiences
text: With just one day left for the film's grand release, the makers of Kanche unveiled a new trailer that literally stunned everyone. The new trailer, more intense and extravagant, glimpses of superbly executed war sequences on a foreign land and the emotional love story set in a village back in India. Another striking element in the new trailer is the film's superb production values which look so grand for a film which is said to be made with a budget of just about 20 crores. Kanche is India's first World War II film and the film promises to be a complete emotional ride filled with authenticity and made with passion by the entire crew. Directed by Krish, Kanche is all set for a huge release in India and in overseas on 22nd October on the occasion of Vijaya Dasami.
